diaspora_content: It focuses on the supplier relationship. Trade And Investment  Promotion is working with the South African company AGENT CBR/ PLUS TECHNOLOGIE INTER
public_content: These are the various public institutions ensuring legality and the process of implementation of the CBR PLUS CON - AID in Cameroon:
private_content: This third category concerns private companies ensuring that Road maintenance works are carried out. Since then, we are working BUNS and SUPER CONFORT Companies.
partenariat_titre: The implementation of CBR PLUS CON-AID  is built around three types of partnerships
contact_content: TRADE AND INVESTMENT PROMOTION is located at the heart of the Cameroonian economic city, that is 20 minutes to Douala International Airport, 15 minutes to the Autonomous Port of Douala and exactly 10 minutes to the Douala Railway Station.
description_con_aid: the con aid/ CBR plus stabilizer is a technology used for the treatment of clay soils (soils with low bearing capacity). this stabilizing product increases the resistance and bearing capacity of clay soil (the CBR index) by making it hydrophobic (refusal of water).
